item.description:
WWW.EASTERNMASSREIA.COM

This Thursday Febuary 12th

HOLIDAY INN Rockland
929 Hingham St.
Rockland, MA

Meeting time is 6:00PM


Thursday March12 EASTERN MASS REIA

Holiday Inn Rockland

929 Hingham St.
Rockland, MA


Next Meeting Thursday March 12th

Don't Miss Special Guest Speaker David Lindahl


David Lindahl has been a Real Estate investor for the past 14 years. He currently owns over 7,020 units around the US. He’s the author of 2 #1 bestselling books, Emerging Real Estate Markets, and Multi-Family Millions. His third book is through Donald Trump’s organization, and is called Commercial Real Estate Investing 101: How Small Investors Can Get Started and Make It Big.



Among other publications David has been featured in Reader’s Digest, Creative Real Estate Lifestyles, AOL and Kiplinger Magazine.


Starting as dead broke landscaper living in a 1 bedroom apartment Dave Lindahl started buying and selling multi-unit properties in Brockton, MA to create a better life for himself.


With no Real Estate experience he created systems that allowed him to create enough monthly positive cash flow to retire with in 3 ½ years.

He also offers a series of home study materials and live events for investors. For more information, visit: www.REMentor.com.


Dave has also agreed to give a special gift to the first 200 people that show up at the event and/or Pre-Register for the event online. Dave has agreed to give a copy of his book "The Making of A Millionaire…You".



Don't let this opportunity slip away, Pre-Register Today!!!!



The Meeting will be held at the Holdiay Inn in Rockland MA on Thursday March 12th 2009. Networking will start at 6:00.




[Pre-Register and Save]



Eastern Mass REIA Members
Is Your Membership About to Expire???

Renew your Membership and enroll into our Loyalty Membership Program today and get your new yearly membership for $119.00
Our Loyalty Program is for Active members who renew before their membership expires. Click here to enroll in our Loyalty Membership Program and Renew your Membership Today!!!

Individual Menbership
Includes monthly meetings, $20 in EMASS CASH, post deals in the members only classified section, discounts on educational events and seminars. $160 yearly.



"EASTERN MASSACHUSETTS REAL ESTATE INVESTORS ASSOCIATION



The door fee for monthly meetings is $25. Pre-Register online for $15!
Go to www.easternmassreia.com to preregister


Business Resource Providers interested in learning about opportunities for sponsorship e-mail us businessresources@easternmassreia.com or call 1 888 588 REIA Ext.701




I look forward to us having a very prosperous 2009.



Derek Ebrecht



p.s. This is Our monthly networking, education, and deal making event, here at Eastern Mass REIA, if you have a deal let us know.






Eastern Massachusetts Real Estate Investors Association
Eastern Massachusetts REIA does not claim to give expert advice in investing, nor do we endorse what featured speakers say. We do not give professional, legal, financial or tax advice. We suggest that you get competent licensed counsel before putting into effect anything you hear in our club, whether in private conversation or something said publicly. The ideas presented are only meant to stimulate your thoughts in the field of real estate investing and are not to be taken as professional advice. All investing comes with risk; therefore, as adults, it is your responsibility to exercise due diligence before making any purchase, great or small. We encourage you to be careful when ordering coffee at a McDonalds drive through window...coffee is usually hot.
